name: Archon, Siege
description: The Archon, Siege, is a Huge celestial creature with immense physical strength, adorned in plate armor. Its powerful physique and celestial nature make it a potent combatant on the battlefield.
memorable: Its Siege Monster ability allows it to deal double damage to structures, making it exceptionally dangerous during sieges.
goals: To serve as a powerful ally in battles, utilizing its physical strength and magical abilities to protect and enforce order.
relations: Typically encountered alongside other celestial beings, such as angels or divine protectors.
environment: Often found in battlefields or areas requiring formidable defense against invading forces.
strengths: Resistant to radiant damage and non-magical attacks, with immunities to being charmed, exhausted, or frightened.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to tactics leveraging its somewhat weaker defense against ranged attacks.
attacks: Can perform multiattacks with its Trunk Maul, dealing both bludgeoning and force damage, or unleash powerful Trumpeting Blasts dealing thunder damage.
most_powerful_ability: Sundering Quake, which can deal massive area-of-effect force damage and potentially collapse structures.
equipment: wields a Trunk Maul that strikes with magical force damage
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and invisibility, alongside a passive perception score of 20.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, enabling it to notice hidden creatures or objects effectively.
additional_information: Immortal Nature allows it to stay vigilant without needing food, drink, or sleep.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
False Appearance enables ambush tactics by remaining indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.
